conbody.p: Some gardening may create a lot of issues leading to pest and disease problems, wastes water, and can wash pollutants into water bodies. Some may even lead to cramped and weak trees, insect development and even to the pollution of the garden.

These mistakes are to be avoided:
Over watering - watering to the point of run off or leaching.
Over planting - designing a landscape with more plants that can adequately be sustained.
Over pruning - removing more foliage or branches from a plant than is healthy for it
Fertilizing inappropriately - applying more fertilizers than necessary
Using pesticides incorrectly - applying more or wrong pesticides
